Headline: Brown Line Service Delayed near Irving Park
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are standing near Irving Park due to report of minor fire near the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are standing near Irving Park due to report of minor fire near the tracks. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #94 California, #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Northbound Reroute near Homan and Division
ShortDescription: Northbound 94 California and 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Homan, Division, Cicero, Fullerton and Homan due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #94 California and #82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Homan, Division, Cicero, Fullerton and Homan due to street blockage near Homan and Division.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Pink Line Service Delayed at 54th Cermak
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Pink Line trains are standing at 54th/Cermak  due to mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Pink Line trains are standing at 54th/Cermak due to mechanical problem on a train.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. Shuttles requested between 54th/Cermak and Pulaski for connecting service.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
